external_references.description: NSA/NCSC. (2019, October 21). Cybersecurity Advisory: Turla Group Exploits Iranian APT To Expand Coverage Of Victims. Retrieved October 16, 2020.
Insikt Group. (2020, March 12). Swallowing the Snake’s Tail: Tracking Turla Infrastructure. Retrieved October 20, 2020.

description: [Turla](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0010) has used malware obtained after compromising other threat actors, such as [OilRig](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0049).(Citation: NSA NCSC Turla OilRig)(Citation: Recorded Future Turla Infra 2020)
